Package ohos.agp.render

Class PixelMapShader

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.render.Shader
      • ohos.agp.render.PixelMapShader

  • public class PixelMapShader
extends Shader
    Draws pixelmaps into textures.

    This class inherits from Shader. You can specify a tile mode for the pixelmap to draw repeated or mirrored pixelmap when the object you need to draw is larger than the shading area defined by the pixelmap shader.

    Since:
    3

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class ohos.agp.render.Shader

        Shader.TileMode

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class ohos.agp.render.Shader

        intColors, mTileMode, shaderColors

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      PixelMapShader​()
      Default constructor used to create a PixelMapShader instance.
      PixelMapShader​(PixelMapHolder holder, Shader.TileMode newTileModeX, Shader.TileMode newTileModeY)
      A constructor used to create a PixelMapShader instance based on the specified PixelMapHolder and the tile modes in X-axis and Y-axis.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • PixelMapShader

        public PixelMapShader​()
        Default constructor used to create a PixelMapShader instance.

        Calling this constructor will automatically invoke PixelMapShader#PixelMapShader(PixelMapHolder, TileMode, TileMode) to create a bitmap shader.

        Since:
        3

      • PixelMapShader

        public PixelMapShader​(PixelMapHolder holder,
                      Shader.TileMode newTileModeX,
                      Shader.TileMode newTileModeY)
        A constructor used to create a PixelMapShader instance based on the specified PixelMapHolder and the tile modes in X-axis and Y-axis.
        Parameters:
        holder - Indicates the pixelmap holder where the pixelmap is to be rendered into texture.
        newTileModeX - Indicates the tile mode used to shade pixelmaps in X-axis direction when the drawn object exceeds the shading area defined by the pixelmap shader.
        newTileModeY - Indicates the tile mode used to shade pixelmaps in Y-axis direction when the drawn object exceeds the shading area defined by the pixelmap shader.
        Since:
        3
